transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

scriptLines: FilmesAcima1950 derive(PrimeiroGenero = iif(locate('|', genres) > 1, left(genres, locate(('|'), genres) -1), genres)) ~> ColunaDerivada

preCopyScript.value: @{concat('IF OBJECT_ID(''',pipeline().parameters.schema, '.', pipeline().parameters.table,''')IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE ',pipeline().parameters.schema, '.', pipeline().parameters.table,'')}

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
DISTINCT id as id_cartoes
FROM [1_RAW].CARTOES
WHERE ARCHIVED = 0

SELECT DISTINCT 
    id as id_fatura
    ,credit_card_id as id_cartao
FROM [1_RAW].CARTOES_TRANSACOES
WHERE YEAR(DATE) >= 2023

text.value:
@concat('DELETE FROM [1_RAW].CARTOES_TRANSACOES_DETALHADAS WHERE ID = ', item().id_fatura, ' AND CREDIT_CARD_ID = ', item().id_cartao
)
